t: Jordan's Furniture (2025) - All You Need to Know BEFORE You Go (with Reviews)
s: STAY away from Jordan's Furniture at all cost! Save time and money and go elsewhere. Customer service is a joke and I had to have my chair repaired with in 4 months of owning it. I also brought a queen size mattress at the same time and then went through two defective Jordans brand mattresses.
